alert.note: Alert for Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 31 at 7:55AM MDT until March 31 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Toole and Liberty and Hill County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the High Wind Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Gusty strong winds can blow away outdoor loose objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County
